name: NSPrintPanel
desc: The Print panel that queries the user for information about a print job.

items.name: var jobStyleHint: NSPrintPanel.JobStyleHint?
items.desc: The type of settings that the print panel displays.

items.name: struct NSPrintPanel.JobStyleHint
items.desc: Constants that specify job style hints for activating the simplified Print panel interface and setting the options to display.

items.name: var options: NSPrintPanel.Options
items.desc: The current configuration options for the Print panel.

items.name: struct NSPrintPanel.Options
items.desc: Constants that specify options for configuring the contents of the main Print panel.

items.name: func defaultButtonTitle() -> String?
items.desc: Returns the title of the Print panel’s default button.

items.name: func setDefaultButtonTitle(String?)
items.desc: Sets the title of the Print panel’s default button.

items.name: var helpAnchor: NSHelpManager.AnchorName?
items.desc: The HTML help anchor associated with the Print panel.

items.name: func addAccessoryController(NSViewController & NSPrintPanelAccessorizing)
items.desc: Adds a custom controller to the Print panel to manage an accessory view.

items.name: func removeAccessoryController(NSViewController & NSPrintPanelAccessorizing)
items.desc: Removes the specified controller and accessory view from the Print panel.

items.name: protocol NSPrintPanelAccessorizing
items.desc: A set of methods that a Print panel object can use to get information from a printing accessory controller.

items.name: var accessoryControllers: [NSViewController]
items.desc: The array of controller objects that manage the Print panel’s accessory views.

items.name: func beginSheet(with: NSPrintInfo, modalFor: NSWindow, delegate: Any?, didEnd: Selector?, contextInfo: UnsafeMutableRawPointer?)
items.desc: Displays a Print panel sheet and runs it modally for the specified window.

items.name: func runModal() -> Int
items.desc: Displays the Print panel and begins the modal loop.

items.name: func runModal(with: NSPrintInfo) -> Int
items.desc: Displays the Print panel and runs the modal loop using the specified printing information.

items.name: var printInfo: NSPrintInfo
items.desc: The information associated with the running Print panel.

items.name: class NSPrintInfo
items.desc: An object that stores information that’s used to generate printed output.
